alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cherokee and east central Bartow Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sutallee, or near Canton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Canton, White, Waleska, Sutallee, Lake Arrowhead and Bridgemill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
